name: Dallia

features.name: Dallia Starport
features.description: Full-service Class B facility. Spacecraft construction, overhaul, refined fuel. Industrial starport supported by TL-9 manufacturing base. Clean, efficient, well-staffed.
features.campaignNotes: The contrast with Milagro's cracked pad is stark. Everything works here.

features.name: Dalport
features.culture: Capital city. Government, finance, commerce. Civil service bureaucracy (functional version).
features.description: Dallia's capital. A proper city with buildings (not domes), transportation networks, industry, and culture. Nordic industrial aesthetic under dense atmosphere. Starport-adjacent.
features.campaignNotes: Base of operations S4. Darrian consulate, McClellan factor office, trade interest offices. Comfortable.

features.name: Sverdheim
features.culture: Industrial center. Manufacturing hub for District 268.
features.description: Dallia's manufacturing heartland. Factories, processing plants, automated assembly lines. TL-9 industrial production that supplies much of the corridor.
features.campaignNotes: McClellan tours. Industrial intelligence about CCF's shipping capacity vs. declared capacity.

features.name: Brightwater
features.culture: Coastal cultural center. Universities, arts, leisure.
features.description: Dallia's cultural capital on the coast. Universities, theaters, galleries. The dense atmosphere creates spectacular twilight colors over the ocean. Darrian Consul Telas Irvan hosts formal dinners here.
features.campaignNotes: Darrian dinner scene. James's intelligence exchange. Cultural respite before storm.

regions.name: Tundra Plains
regions.description: Cool tundra grasslands covering Dallia's temperate zone. Short growing seasons but rich soil. Agricultural communities interspersed with manufacturing settlements.

regions.name: The Great Ocean
regions.description: Dallia's primary ocean covering the eastern hemisphere. Warm currents from the dense atmosphere create rich marine ecosystems. Brightwater sits on its western shore.

regions.name: Polar Reaches
regions.description: Northern polar ice cap. Less extensive than colder worlds due to the dense atmosphere's greenhouse effect. Mining operations extract minerals.

arrivalBriefing:
Dallia fills the viewport like a proper world should — blue-white atmosphere haze, visible continents, cloud formations that suggest weather rather than chemical processes. The dense atmosphere scatters the F2 primary's light into a warm glow.

The Class B starport is immediately obvious: a proper industrial facility with multiple docking arms, fuel processing towers, and the steady traffic of commercial shipping. This is civilization — the first real city the crew has seen since leaving the Imperium proper.

Descent through the dense atmosphere is smooth. The starport grounds are clean, well-maintained, and staffed by people who look healthy, fed, and unhurried. After Milagro and Forine, it feels like arriving in a different century.

gmQuickRef.population: 600M across proper cities and settlements. Real civilization.
gmQuickRef.hazards: Dense atmosphere (safe, breathable). Cool tundra climate. Near-standard gravity (0.90G).
gmQuickRef.firstImpressions: Things work. Food is real. Beds are soft. The infrastructure is maintained. Comfortable competence.
